Bloomington.Wells Fargo Plaza (Bloomington): Wells Fargo Plaza is a high-rise office tower complex located at 7900 Xerxes Avenue in Bloomington, Minnesota in the United States. Standing at 300 feet with 24 stories of Class A rated office space, the main tower is considered one of the more dominant landmarks of Interstate 494, and is noted for the revolving restaurant that sits at its peak. The tower connects to an auxiliary three story building through a central atrium.
